column11: 4、您在深圳长大吗？Have you grown up in Shenzhen?
column12: 5、您曾经或现在生活在深圳吗？Do you live, or have you lived in Shenzhen?
column13: 6、您在深圳待了多长时间？How much time have you spent in Shenzhen?
column14: 7、在任何城市，您多久去一次公园？In any city, how often do you go to a green park?
column15: 8、在任何一个城市，您花多少时间在户外散步、休息、骑自行车或类似的户外活动？In any city, how much time to you spend outdoors for walking, resting, bicycling, or similar?
column16: 9、您如何评价我们刚刚参观过的公园的声音景观的整体质量？1=音质很差7=优秀的音质How do you rate the overall quality of the soundscape in the green park that we just visited? 1=bad sound quality 7=excellent sound quality—
column17: 10、您在公园的录音，有什么深圳特色吗？1=没有特色，在任何城市能找到7=很有特色，只能在深圳找到或象征深圳Your recordings in the green park, how characteristic are they for Shenzhen?1=not characteristic, could be found in any other city7=very characteristic, can only be found in Shenzhen or symbolize Shenzhen—
column18: 11、您如何评价我们刚刚参观的科技园区的声音景观的整体质量？1=音质很差7=优秀的音质How do you rate the overall quality of the soundscape in the science park that we just visited?1=bad sound quality 7=excellent sound quality—
column19: 12、您在科技园区的录音，有什么深圳特色吗？1=没有特色，在任何城市能找到7=很有特色，只能在深圳找到或代表深圳Your recordings in the science park, how characteristic are they for Shenzhen?1=not characteristic, could be found in any other city7=very characteristic, can only be found in Shenzhen or symbolize Shenzhen—
column20: 13、您录制的声音对您的城市生活体验有多大影响？1=毫无影响7=它们很重要How much do the sounds that you recorded matter in your urban experience?1=not at all 7=they matter a lot—
column21: 14、声音对于您的重要程度是？How much does sound generally matter to you? —
column22: 15、公园里的声音和科技园区里的声音有什么不同？1=没有不同，基本相同的声音7=非常不同，没有相同的声音How different are the sounds in the green park from the sounds in the science park?1=not different, basically same sounds7=very different, no same sounds—
column23: 16、通过这款应用程序录制声音是否改变了您的倾听方式？1=完全没有7 =极大程度Did the act of recording sounds through the app change your way of listening?1=not at all7=very much—
column24: 17、应用程序的用户界面如何影响您的录音或您对录音的选择？(不超过50字）How did the app’s user interface influence your recording or your choice of recordings? (<50 characters ）
